column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My first time in Chicago
column2: and I wanted to try the local deep dish pizza. The reviews for Malnati's were high on praise
column3: and I was in the area
column4: so that's where I went. I started with the House salad
column6: and then I had the Malnati special classic deep dish. The Sausage was excellent
column8: and the crust was nice as well. Overall
column10: but I just can't make myself think of this as pizza. I guess I'm more of a NY style guy.
